review: I thought I could use this device to stream from my computer on several diferent places (work, class room or home), but is not that easy: You most configurate when you change from one place to another, and PC and Chromecast must be connected to the same Wifi network; in places with high security network, you will have to register the MAC address.For household applications I would rather recommend AppleTV or FireTV: you do not need another device (PC, tablet or phone) to watch what you want.Chromecast is like a HDMI cable that needs Wifi to work.
